committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Panama Canal and Outer Continental Shelf

official_title: A bill amending the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act to improve safety at manned offshore installations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Offshore Installation Emergency Evacuation Act - Amends the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act to require the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to promulgate regulations: (1) within 90 days of enactment, requiring a manned standby vessel equipped with a radio to be in the immediate vicinity of all manned installations on the Outer Continental Shelf; and (2) within 180 days of enactment, identifying and requiring appropriate facilities, to supplement such manned standby vessel, in order to provide for the safest possible evacuation of such manned installations. Defines "manned installation" as any of various types of structures used in the drilling, exploration, or production of hydrocarbons.

titles.title: A bill amending the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act to improve safety at manned offshore installations, and for other purposes.
